entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Please release a new stable 6.x version of the System.Runtime.Experimental package #66884
  • System.Text.Json SourceGenerator doesn't handle generic models #66882
  • System.Text.Json SourceGenerator crashes if context is an inner class of a generic type #66881
  • System.Text.Json SourceGenerator behaves oddly if context is generic #66880
  • Using UMONITOR, UMWAIT, TPAUSE in CLR and exposing in Intel specific hardware intrinsics #66873
  • Use REP MOVSB on Ice Lake+ for locals init #66872
  • RotateFlip for 1-bit image with the width of multiples of 8 #66871

Closed

  • ushort argument mysteriously mutated #66624
    7.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'genFuncletInfo.fiSpDelta1 >= -240' during 'Generate code' #65996
    7.0.0
  • TlsHandshakeType value 24 should be labeled KeyUpdate #66781
  • RegexGenerator fails for interfaces with in/out type parameters #66842
  • System.Security.Cryptography.Tests out of memory #66831
  • System.Threading.ThreadPools.Tests.ThreadPoolTests.CooperativeBlockingCanCreateThreadsFaster has failed #66755
    7.0.0
  • System.IO.Pipelines inifinite wait PipeReader.ReadAtLeastAsync(Int32, CancellationToken) #66645
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [Group 4] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.TraceSource` #66892
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution
  • [Group 4] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Http` #66891
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory
  • Vectorize Guid equality. #66889
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • WIP: CoreCLR support for default interface implementation of static virtual methods #66887
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • Fixes 42643 Work in Progress attempt at getting this to work - https://github.com/dotnet/runtime/issues/42643 #66886
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1672255 #66883
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Managed implementation of NTLM for Android and tvOS #66879
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • Fixing a hang of NamedPipeClientStream when connecting with infinite timeout #66877
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Fixes #64159 - JsonSerializerContext source generation fails with keyword identifiers #66876
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • [mono] Remove the llvmonly exception handling code, its not used any … #66875
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • [release/6.0] Fix cancel in PipeReader.ReadAtLeastAsync #66870
    Servicing-consider, area-System.IO.Pipelines, 6.0.x
  • Reduce the cost of adding many unnamed parameters to an OdbcCommand. #66869
    area-System.Data.Odbc, community-contribution
  • feat: Add support for emscripten module exports #66868
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, community-contribution

Merged

  • Fix too narrow loads while unspilling #66675
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Merged wrapper support for test exclusion lists #66680
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Disabled System.Security.Cryptography.Tests for Android x64 and x86 #66833
    area-System.Security
  • Fix Character Spelling in ContentType #66857
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • JIT: handle large OSR funclet frame initial SP delta for arm64 type 5… #66124
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Include sys/auxv.h in getexepath #66874
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Fixed TlsHandshakeType enum label #66786
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • Add tests for RegexGenerator on interface and virtual members #66850
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • Avoid boxing array enumerator in StackTrace.TryResolveStateMachineMethod #66836
    area-System.Diagnostics
  • Avoid IntPtr[] allocation in Associates.AssignAssociates #66825
    area-System.Reflection
  • [mono] Make the --llvmonly mode the same as --llvmonly-interp. #66811
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Do not include redist files in runtime packs #66805
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix cancel in PipeReader.ReadAtLeastAsync #66752
    area-System.IO.Pipelines, 7.0.0

Updated

  • Deduplicate project files with the same name in different folders #64841
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [mono] Fix static virtual calls to generic methods from gshared code #66739
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [mono][interp] Fix a few local store warnings #66766
  • Avoid allocating a delegate in OptionsMonitor.Get() when possible. #66688
    area-Extensions-Options, community-contribution
  • Port Access violation occurring in System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ForestTrustRelationshipInformation fix from .netfx to .net-core #66726
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • Try to fix a time-sensitive thread pool test #66765
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-jit directory #62843
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, 7.0.0
  • [API Implementation]: Use TimeSpan everywhere we use an int for seconds, milliseconds, and timeouts (Group 1/3) #64860
    area-Meta, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add metrics for caching #66479
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Caching
  • [PERF][MAUI] Update Podcast app repo #66843
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [wasm] Do not set _WasmDevel=true for blazor projects #66793
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Refactor suggested in 65842 #66821
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Fix heap walking with global allocation context #66844
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Add the CustomTypeMarshallerAttribute type to make it easier to identify marshaller types #65591
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Improved error handling in debug proxy #65828
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Ensure that fgMorphFieldToSimdGetElement doesn't call gtNewSimdGetElementNode if the ISA is unsupported #66853
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Cloning improvements #66257
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Fix macOS ARM64 stack overflow detection #66612
    Servicing-approved, area-PAL-coreclr, 6.0.5
  • Don't apply IMAGE_REL_BASED_REL32 when address doesn't belong to current section #66855
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update coredistools from 1.0.1-prerelease-00006 to 1.1.0 #66861
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [Group 4] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Debug` #66862
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Remove `IsEmpty` workaround in `Span` and `ReadOnlySpan` #66865
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Add Arm64 PGO Builds #66867
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix crossgen2 RID in linux-musl cross build #66814
    area-Infrastructure-installer, community-contribution
  • Add SubstitutionParser that uses XPath Navigator into NativeAOT #64671
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix summary doc, the client name is an argument. #66703
    area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory, community-contribution
